121722.「……ようこそ 占いの館へ。\n あなたを お待ちしていました。\n さあ こち:
Welcome to the Divine House. We've been
expecting you. Please have a seat.

121723.「それではまず あなたのお名前と\n お仕事を 教えてくださいますか？:
So, first of all, can you tell us your name
and what you do?

121724.「あ……はい。私の名は サラシナと申します。\n カミハルムイ王の命により 世界:
Uh...yes. My name is Sarashina. By order of King Kamiharmui, I am traveling with my companions to investigate demon miasmas around
the world.

121725.「サラシナさんですね。\n 本日は この占い師 <pc>が\n あなたの悩みを:
You must be Sarashina. Today this fortune
teller <pc> will guide you to the
solution of your problem.

121726.「さあ……心安らかに リラックスして。\n どんなことでも構いません。あなたの悩:
Now... relax and be at peace. Whatever it is, whatever you want to talk about, just let know. Tell about
your problems and let us hear them.

121727.「え…ええ。それでは……\n 全世界における 魔瘴の被害が 拡大の一途を\n た:
Uh... yeah. So...did you know that demon
miasma continues to spread throughout the
world?

121728.「私は かつてない危機感を覚えています……。\n 急ぎ調査を進め わが王に ご報:
I am in an unprecedented state of crisis and I
am constantly thinking of how quickly I must
investigate and report back to our king.

121729.「なるほど……。つまり サラシナさんは\n 世界の危機について憂い 悩んでいる。:
I see... so Mr. Sarashina is worried about the
world crisis. Is that what you mean?

121730.「あっ いえ……。私が 相談したかったのは\n 人間関係の悩み……といいますか\:
No, what I wanted to talk to you about was a
problem in my human relationship, or rather,
my colleague Inaniwa.

121731.「イナニワときたら……とんだマイペース男で！\n 資料に没頭したら 周りが見えな:
Inaniwa is a man of his own pace! When he gets
absorbed in his work, he loses sight of the
world around him and acts on his own.

121732.「これでは 何のために ふたりで旅に出たのか。\n いまだ これといった成果を上:
What was the point of setting out on this journey together? We have yet to accomplish anything of note, and our king is still
disappointed.

121733.「この先 彼とうまくやっていける気がしません。\n もう いっそのこと ひとりで:
I don't think I can get along with him in the
future. I think I should just go back to
Eltona by myself...!

121734.「……人の行く手には 常に\n 無数の選択肢が 広がっています。:
There are always countless choices in one's
path.

121735.「あなたは 彼に黙って 帰ってしまってもいい。\n しかし 心迷い 占いの館を訪:
You may leave without telling him. But if you visited the Divine House because you were confused, then there must be some other hidden
thought in your mind.

121737.「……わかりました。\n セラピアカードが あなたの真実の心へと\n 導いてくれ:
...I understand. Let the Serapia Cards lead
you to your heart of truth.

121738.「さあ <pc>さん。\n サラシナさんの心に 寄り添って……。\n 彼女に カ:
Come on <pc>. Now, you must lean into
Ms. Sarashina's mind... and ask her to Draw a
Card.

121739.サラシナは セラピアカードから\n「恋人たち」のカードを引いた！:
Sarashina drew a "Lovers" card from her
Serapia Cards!

121740.なんと サラシナが引いたカードが\n不思議な声で <pc>に\n語りかけてくる…:
My God, the card that Sarashina drew speaks to
<pc> in a mysterious voice...

121741.<center>素直な気持ちで まっすぐに 胸の的を射よ。\n<%sEV_QUE:
Shoot straight at the target on its chest with
honesty. Defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Healium Balloons.
Then the door to one's heart shall open.

121742.「恋人たちのカードに導かれ\n この <pc>が ふたたび あなたの前に\n 現:
When <pc> appears before you again,
guided by the lovers card, all your problems
will be solved.

121743.「どうか 私たちの占いを信じて\n 心安らかに お待ちください……。:
Please, trust in our divination and wait with
peace of mind...

121744.「……わかりました。私は このオルフェアの町の\n 預かり所のソファで お待ちし:
...Okay. I'll be waiting for you on the sofa
in the Orphea depository. Please, I'm
counting on you.

121745.「さあ <pc>さん。あなたには これから\n サラシナさんのお悩みを 解決する:
Come on, <pc>. You are now going to
put your power into the Serapia Cards in order
to solve Sarashina's problem.

121746.「先ほど サラシナさんが引いたカードが\n あなたに 何かしらの試練を課したはず:
The Card that Mr. Sarashina drew earlier must
have imposed some kind of trial on you. Do you
remember what it was?

121747.「……なるほど。でしたら どの地域に生息する\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
I see... If so, please defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Healium
Balloons, no matter which region they are
found in.

121748.「この近くだと オルフェア地方東にある\n オルッパ地下洞くつの 奥の方で\n:
Near here, I've seen them in the back of the
Orppa Cavern in the eastern Orphea Region.

121749.「あなたが その試練を乗り越えた時\n セラピアカードに 特別なチカラが\n 宿:
When you go through that trial, your Serapia
Cards will have a special power.

121750.「その後 占い師になっている状態で ひとりで\n サラシナさんのもとへ行き チカ:
Then, in the state of being a fortune teller,
go to Sarashina alone and hold up the Serapia
Cards, which contains the power.

121751.「そこから先は タロット占いの秘術\n アルカナ・セラピアが 真の威力を\n 発:
From there, the secret art of Tarot reading,
Arcana Serapia, will come into its true
power...

121752.「時に 命の危険に さらされることもあります。\n 何が起きてもいいように 準備:
Sometimes, you may be in danger of losing your
life. Please be prepared for anything that may
happen.

121753.「それでは よろしくお願いします。\n 私たちの占いで サラシナさんの悩みを\n:
Well then, I look forward to working with you.
Let us help you with your problems, Sarashina,
with our fortune-telling!

121755.「アノヒトニ キラワレタクナイ……\n キズツキタクナイ……。デモ……。:
I don't want to be killed by someone... I
don't want to be hurt by someone... Demo...

121759.「セラピアカードのチカラを用いて あなたが\n サラシナさんの心を 開いてくださ:
You used the power of the Serapia Cards to
open Sarashina's heart so that I could come to
her heart.

121760.「……好きな人に拒絶されたら どうしよう？\n 素直な気持ちを 伝えるのが怖い。:
...What if the person I love rejects me? I'm
afraid to express my honest feelings. Then
let's just keep our feelings to ourselves...

121761.「今のは そんな サラシナさんの心の闇。\n イナニワさんへの想いが 増すなかで:
What you see now is the Dark Mind of Ms. Sarashina. It is the embodiment of her weak heart, which was born from her growing
feelings for Inaniwa.

121762.「こうして 相談者の心の中に入り\n 心の闇に直接対決を挑み 撃退することで\n:
In this way, we can enter the mind of a client and confront the Dark Mind directly, and by fighting back, we can eliminate the cause of
the person's distress...

121763.「従来の常識を くつがえす 画期的な占い。\n それこそが アルカナ・セラピアな:
A revolutionary form of divination that
overturns conventional wisdom. That is what
Arcana Serapia is all about.

121764.「<cs_pchero>さんが 心の闇を消し去ったことで\n 勇気を出せなかった:
I'm sure will change Sarashina's mind, who has been unable to muster up the courage to do so, now that the Dark Mind has
been erased from her. And...

121765.「これは ピュアパール。\n アルカナ・セラピアを使って 浄化された\n 人の心:
This is a pure pearl. It's a beautiful
gemstone that comes from a person's heart that
has been purified using Arcana serapia.

121766.「占い師の 究極の目的とは……\n 世界中の人々の悩みを解決すること。\n 人々:
The ultimate goal of fortune tellers is to
solve the problems of people all over the
world. To eliminate the suffering of people.

121767.「このピュアパールは いつか 世の人々すべてを\n 悩みから解放するために 必要:
These pure pearls are what I need to one day
free the world from all its troubles... so I
collect them. That's why I collect them.

121768.「おつかれさまでした <cs_pchero>さん。\n 一人前の占い師への 着実:
Good night <cs_pchero>. You have taken a
solid step toward becoming a full-fledged
fortune teller.

121769.「さあ……そろそろ 元の世界へ帰りましょう。\n サラシナさんの様子を 見たあと:
Now...it's time to go back to the world. After
you check on Sarashina, please come back to
the Divine House.

142640.<pc>は サラシナへの 思いを込めて\nテーブルに セラピアカードを並べた。:
<pc> laid out the Serapia Cards on
the table with thoughts for Sarashina.

142642.「……今 サラシナさんが 引いたカードに\n 占い師の秘術 アルカナ・セラピアで:
Now, Sarashina will use the fortune teller's
secret Arcana Serapia to imbue the drawn Card
with special powers.
